2: <pb/><t>Ak yo'oon wank linch'ool, at inYos;</t> <t>tinb'ichanq ut tinwajb'aq cho'q aawe.</t> <t>Ajen, at waanm,</t>
3: <t>ajenqex, ex aarp ut kitaar:</t> <t>twaj rajsinkil li kutan naq taahik'e'q.</t>
4: <pb/><t>Tinnima aawu sa' xyanqeb' li tenamit, at Qaawa';</t> <t>tinb'icha laaloq'al sa' xyanqeb' li poyanam,</t>
5: <t>xb'aan naq nim chik laarahom chiru li choxa,</t> <t>ut li xtiikilal laach'ool nawulak toj sa'eb' li choql.<f>[292]</f></t>
6: <pb/><t>At inYos, chaterq'usi laawankil toj sa' xb'een li choxa,</t> <t>ut chiwanq laaloq'al sa' chixjunil li ruuchich'och'!<f>[293]</f></t>
7: <t>Choohaasume chaq ut choohaakol rik'in xwankil laawuq',</t> <t>re naq te'kole'q li raarookeb' aab'aan!</t>
8: <pb/><t>Li Yos ki'aatinak chaq toj sa' li xloq'laj ochoch:</t> <t>“Ok we chi xjachinkil Sikén chi sa sa' inch'ool,</t> <t>tinb'is chixjunil li xtaq'ahil Sukot, chan.</t>
9: <t>We laa'in li xsutam Galahad ut Manasés;</t> <t>Efraín a'an xkoleb' linjolom</t> <t>ut Judá a'an linloq'laj b'aar.</t>
10: <t>Mohab a'an li emel xna'aj linch'ajleb';</t> <t>tinkut linperxaab' sa' xb'een Edom,</t> <t>ut tinb'ichanq xb'aan naq xinnumtaak sa' xb'eeneb' laj Filistea”.</t>
11: <pb/><t>Ani taab'eresinq we toj sa' li kawub'resinb'il tenamit?</t> <t>Ani taak'amoq linb'e chi xik toj Edom?</t>
12: <t>At Qaawa', laa'at xatkanab'ank qe qajunes</t> <t>ut ink'a' chik nakat-okenk chi yalok chiqix laa'o!</t>
13: <t>Maak'a' na'ok wi' li xtenq'ahom li winq;</t> <t>choohaatenq'a taxaq sa' li yalok.</t>
14: <t>Qochb'een li Yos tqab'aanu sachb'ach'oolej;</t> <t>a'an taasachoq xwankil eb' li xik' neke'ilok qe!</t>
